definitions.definition: Any considerable and connected part of a space or surface ; specifically, a tract of land or sea of considerable but indefinite extent ; a country ; a district ; in a broad sense, a place without special reference to location or extent but viewed as an entity for geographical , social or cultural reasons.
examples: the upper regions of the atmosphere

definitions.definition: An administrative subdivision of a city , a territory , a country .

subdefinitions.definition: Such a division of the city of Rome and of the territory about Rome, of which the number varied at different times; a district , quarter , or ward .
An administrative subdivision of the European Union .
A subnational region of Chile ; equivalent to province .
Ellipsis of regional municipality , a county -level municipality .
Ellipsis of administrative region . A subprovincial region of Quebec; the primary level subdivision; a prefecture .

definitions.definition: The inhabitants of a region or district of a country.
A place in or a part of the body in any way indicated.

examples: The average age of the club's members is in the region of 35.

definitions.definition: The space from the earth's surface out to the orbit of the moon : properly called the elemental region .

main_definition: Any considerable and connected part of a space or surface ; specifically, a tract of land or sea of considerable but indefinite extent ; a country ; a district ; in a broad sense, a place without special reference to location or extent but viewed as an entity for geographical , social or cultural reasons.
secondary_definitions: An administrative subdivision of a city , a territory , a country .
( figuratively ) The inhabitants of a region or district of a country.
( anatomy ) A place in or a part of the body in any way indicated.
( obsolete ) The space from the earth's surface out to the orbit of the moon : properly called the elemental region .
